visible.description: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

position.description: Specifies the position of the drawer.

baseZIndex.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.
baseZIndex.description_zh: 要在分层中使用的 Base zIndex 值。

dismissable.description: Whether clicking outside closes the panel.
dismissable.description_zh: 单击外部是否关闭面板。

showCloseIcon.description: Whether to display a close icon inside the panel.
showCloseIcon.description_zh: 是否在面板内显示关闭图标。

closeButtonProps.description: Used to pass the custom value to read for the button inside the component.
closeButtonProps.description_zh: 用于传递要读取组件内按钮的自定义值。

closeIcon.description: Icon to display in the drawer close button.
closeIcon.description_zh: 显示在抽屉关闭按钮中的图标。

modal.description: Whether to a modal layer behind the drawer.
modal.description_zh: 是否在抽屉后面的模态层。

blockScroll.description: Whether background scroll should be blocked when drawer is visible.
blockScroll.description_zh: 当抽屉可见时是否应阻止背景滚动。

dt.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.
dt.description_zh: 它使用组件的设计令牌生成范围限定的 CSS 变量。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的 passthrough（pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

slots.name: header
closeicon
container
